Body:
from wallloss import wallloss
Beta = wallloss(Pn, Cn, Gi, eta_a, Dp, MW, Varr, sbn, nc, TEMP, t,
    inflectDp, pwl_xpre, pwl_xpro, inflectk, ChamR, Rader, testf, p_char,
    e_field)
if p_char == 0:
    ax0.loglog(Dp * 1000000.0, Beta, 'k')
    ax0.set_title('Wall Loss Rate of Neutral and Charged Particles')
    ax0.set_xlim([0.01, 10.0])
    ax0.set_xlabel('$\\rm{D_p}$ ($\\rm{\\mu}$m)', fontsize=12)
    ax0.set_ylabel('$\\rm{\\beta_{T}$ $(s^{-1})}$', fontsize=12)
    ax0.text(0.5, 0.05, 'R = 35 cm')
    ax0.text(0.5, 0.03, 'E = 45 volts/cm')
    ax0.text(0.5, 0.018, '$\\rm{k_{e}=6.4x10^{-3}\\, s^{-1}}$')
    ax0.text(0.025, 5e-05, 'n=0')
if p_char == 1:
    ax0.loglog(Dp * 1000000.0, Beta, 'k')
    ax0.text(0.03, 0.003, 'n=1')
if p_char == 2:
    ax0.loglog(Dp * 1000000.0, Beta, 'k')
    ax0.text(0.05, 0.004, '2')
if p_char == 3:
    ax0.loglog(Dp * 1000000.0, Beta, 'k')
    ax0.text(0.085, 0.005, '3')
if p_char == -1000000.0:
    ax0.loglog(Dp * 1000000.0, Beta, '--k', label=
        '$D_{p,flec}=1\\, \\mathrm{\\mu m},\\, \\nabla_{pre}=1,\\, \\nabla_{pro}=1,\\, \\beta_{flec}=\\mathrm{2x10^{-5} s^{-1}}$'
        )
if p_char == -2000000.0:
    ax0.loglog(Dp * 1000000.0, Beta, '-.k', label=
        '$D_{p,flec}=0.8\\, \\mathrm{\\mu m},\\, \\nabla_{pre}=0,\\, \\nabla_{pro}=-1,\\, \\beta_{flec}=\\mathrm{1x10^{-3} s^{-1}}$'
        )
    ax0.legend()
